metaTags.content: RP Daley.com | Recipes | Garden Gold Soup
RP Daley.com | Recipes | Garden Gold Soup

Indulge your taste buds in a symphony of flavours with this delightful Garden Gold Soup recipe. Bursting with the vibrant hues and wholesome goodness of fresh vegetables, this soup is a celebration of nature's bounty. Crafted with a medley of carrots, potatoes, celery, onions and a host of aromatic herbs, each spoonful is a journey through the rich tapestry of garden-fresh ingredients.
Garden, Gold, Soup, Recipe, RP Daley

structuredData.name: Garden Gold Soup
structuredData.description: Indulge your taste buds in a symphony of flavours with this delightful Garden Gold Soup recipe. Bursting with the vibrant hues and wholesome goodness of fresh vegetables, this soup is a celebration of nature's bounty. Crafted with a medley of carrots, potatoes, celery, onions and a host of aromatic herbs, each spoonful is a journey through the rich tapestry of garden-fresh ingredients.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut up the carrots, potatoes, celery, and onions and place in 3-Quart saucepan
Add Salt, Instant chicken bouillon granules, Dried dill weed, Pepper and Water
Simmer covered for 45 - 60 minutes (or until tender)
Strain and reserve 2 cups of liquid
Using an immersion blender process until smooth
Add some amount of reserve liquid to desired consistency
Cover and heat to desired serving temperature
